short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RSS Detector for Erinome RSS extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to determine whether there are RSS feeds on pages you visit and what their URLs are. It is useful for setting up Erinome RSS reader extension, where you would need to know the addresses of your feeds to add them for the first time.
